titles.title: To designate the portion of Interstate Route 57 that is located in Illinois as the "Barack Obama Highway", and for other purposes.
To designate the portion of Interstate Route 57 that is located in Illinois as the "Barack Obama Highway", and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: This bill designates the portion of Interstate Route 57 that is located in Illinois as the "Barack Obama Highway."
